SELECT product_store_plm.id id, product_store_plm.prod_name prodName, product_store_plm.prod_no prodNo FROM product_store_plm
LEFT JOIN prod_bom_plm on prod_bom_plm.prod_no = product_store_plm.prod_no and prod_bom_plm.company_id = product_store_plm.company_id and prod_bom_plm.deleted = 'F' WHERE product_store_plm.company_id = #{companyId}
AND product_store_plm.store_id is null AND product_store_plm.deleted = 'F'
AND product_store_plm.prod_name like concat('%',#{productName},'%')
and prod_bom_plm.bom_no like concat('%',#{bomCode},'%')

SELECT prod_bom_plm.bom_no AS bomNo, prod_bom_plm.versions, prod_bom_plm.voucher_no AS voucherNo, prod_bom_plm.make_emp AS makeEmp, prod_bom_plm.bom_status AS bomStatus, prod_bom_plm.`status`, prod_bom_plm.make_date AS makeDate, prod_bom_plm.prod_no as prodNO, voucher_main_oa.is_finished AS voucherStatus, product_store_plm.id AS productId, product_store_plm.prod_no AS productNo, product_store_plm.prod_name AS productName FROM prod_bom_plm left JOIN voucher_main_oa ON voucher_main_oa.voucher_no = prod_bom_plm.voucher_no AND voucher_main_oa.deleted = 'F' INNER JOIN product_store_plm ON prod_bom_plm.prod_no = product_store_plm.prod_no AND product_store_plm.deleted = 'F' AND product_store_plm.store_id is null WHERE prod_bom_plm.deleted = 'F' AND prod_bom_plm.company_id = #{companyId} and prod_bom_plm.prod_no = #{productNo} AND prod_bom_plm.versions = (SELECT MAX(prod_bom_plm.versions) FROM prod_bom_plm WHERE prod_bom_plm.deleted = 'F' AND prod_bom_plm.company_id = #{companyId} AND prod_bom_plm.prod_no = #{productNo} AND product_store_plm.store_id is null) AND product_store_plm.store_id is null

SELECT prod_bom_plm.bom_no AS bomNo, prod_bom_plm.versions, prod_bom_plm.make_emp AS makeEmp, prod_bom_plm.bom_status AS bomStatus, prod_bom_plm.`status`, prod_bom_plm.make_date AS makeDate, voucher_main_oa.is_finished voucherStatus FROM prod_bom_plm LEFT JOIN voucher_main_oa ON voucher_main_oa.voucher_no = prod_bom_plm.voucher_no AND voucher_main_oa.deleted = 'F' AND prod_bom_plm.company_id = #{companyId} and prod_bom_plm.mid_prod_no = #{midProductNo}

SELECT product_store_plm.id id, product_store_plm.prod_name prodName, product_store_plm.prod_no prodNo, product_mid_plm.id midProductId, product_mid_plm.mid_prod_name midProdName, product_mid_plm.mid_prod_no midProdNo FROM product_store_plm LEFT JOIN product_mid_plm ON product_store_plm.prod_no = product_mid_plm.prod_no AND product_mid_plm.deleted = 'F' WHERE product_store_plm.company_id = #{companyId} AND product_store_plm.deleted = 'F' AND product_store_plm.prod_name=#{productName} AND product_mid_plm.store_id is null AND product_store_plm.store_id is null
OR product_mid_plm.mid_prod_no = #{bomCode}
